import {useState} from 'react' import useClima from '../hooks/useClima' const Formulario = () => { const [ alerta , setAlerta] = useState("") const { busqueda , datosBusqueda , consultarClima } = useClima() const { cuidad , pais } = busqueda const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (Object.values(busqueda).includes('')) { setAlerta('todos los campos son obligatorios') return } consultarClima(busqueda) } return ( <>
{ alerta &&

{alerta}

}
) } export default Formulario
